amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in the Congressional Record to increase veterans' medical care by $35 million, to provide health benefits to certain Filipino World War II veterans, and increase (from the peso rate to the full dollar amount) service-connected disability benefits for Filipino WW II veterans living in the United States.

action.text: Mr. Walsh raised a point of order against the Filner amendment (A003). Mr. Walsh stated that the amendment sought to appropriate funds not previously authorized and as such, constituted legislation on an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
